text: Ben Gardane Delegation (, '; ) is a delegation (county) of the Medenine Governorate in Southeastern Tunisia. census it had a population of 79,912, close to the border with Libya. It is located at around . There has one town (municipality) in the Ben Gardane Delegation, Ben Gardane city. ==Geography== The Delegation encompasses the south-easternmost coastal strip, totalling 4732 km² and had a population of 79,912 at the 2014 census. Census 2014 (National Institute of Statistics) The capital is Ben Gardane city. ==Administrative divisions== The Delegation is divided into twelve imadas (with their populations at the 2014 Census): {| class="wikitable centre sortable" !
